main.name: Adit Mehta
main.occupation: Open Source Contributor | Full Stack Developer
main.bio: Hi there! I am Adit! I am currently Full Stack Software Dev Co-op at Igloo Software, and I am currently employed as Coding Tutor at the Inspiration learning centre. For Frontend development, I use ReactJS because it is easy to learn, it has a massive active community, and it accelerates the development process. I have developed many projects which use Node.JS as a backend. I like to use Node.JS because it shines in building fast, scalable network applications, offers benefits in performance, faster development, and other perks. I am an open-source enthusiast. I have contributed to many open source organizations. Some of them are Google/ShakaPlayer, AnitaB, Chapel.

education.degree: Post Graduate in Computer Software Database Development

education.school: Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology (DA-IICT)

work.title: Full Stack Software Dev Co-op
work.description: Start of the Co-op term, Tech Onboarding, understanding the code of the flagship product.

work.title: Coding Tutor
work.description: Teaching Student Competitive Coding in C++ and Python for Canadian Computing Competition.

work.title: Full Stack Blockchain Engineer
work.description: Developing API for lazy minting using Moralis and developing the front end of the website for Heroes of Ukraine.

work.title: Open Source Contributor
work.description: Added replay icon instead of play when the video ends. Fixed bugs in Docs generated using JSDoc-API. Found and fixed bug of resolution change with language change. Found valid enhancements in UI.

work.title: Maintainer and Open Source Contributor
work.description: Deployed Bridge in Tech Web ReactJS project on Github pages using Github Actions. Added an issue template in AnitaB repo. Fixed UI issue in PowerUp App. Found bugs in PowerUp App. Validated, assigned, labeled issues, reviewed PRs, completed weekly action items in the Mentorship App.

work.title: Research Internship
work.description: Literature survey on current research of both 5G and loT, 5G loT architecture requirements, requirements in 5G enabled loT, key enabling technologies in 5G-IoT, research challenges, and future trends.

testimonials.text: Adit is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
